translations.You dropped an invalid file that can not: You selected or dropped a file ("{0}") that can not be processed. Please select only valid files (Textfiles, Cuesheets, Audiofiles)!
translations.Import textfile tooltip: Import a plain text file and extract data via regular expressions
translations.Import cuesheet tooltip: Import a cuesheet file and extract all data from it
translations.Title: Title
translations.Unlink this track from previous track: Unlink this track from previous track
translations.Link this track with previous track: Link this track with previous track
translations.Edit track tooltip: Edit track details in a dialog
translations.Copy track tooltip: Copy this track with all values and attach it to the cuesheet.
translations.Move track up tooltip: Move this track one position up
translations.Move track down tooltip: Move this track one position down
translations.Enter textimportscheme cuesheet tooltip: Enter textscheme for cuesheet properties import here. Identification will be done using regular expressions.
translations.Enter textimportscheme cuesheet here: Enter textscheme for cuesheet properties import here
translations.Enter textimportscheme track tooltip: Enter textscheme for track properties import here. Identification will be done using regular expressions.
translations.Enter textimportscheme track here: Enter textscheme for track properties import here
translations.Error during textimport: An error occured during text import
translations.Import not possible due to textimport er: Import is not possible due to errors. Please check import errors!
translations.Name: Name
translations.Flag4CHTooltip: Set this if track contains four channel audio
translations.FlagDCPTooltip: Set this if track is digital copy permitted
translations.FlagPRETooltip: Set this if track has Pre-emphasis enabled
translations.FlagSCMSTooltip: Set this if track has "Serial Copy Management System"
translations.The file {0} can not be used for operati: The file "{0}" you supplied does not match the requested operation: "{1}". Please provide a valid file!
translations.Do you really want to import this file?: Do you really want to import this file? This can not be reversed and unsaved changes are lost!
translations.Enter cataloguenumber here: Enter the catalogue number of the cuesheet. Catalogue number is a 13 decimal digits number.
translations.Here all validation messages are display: Here all validation messages are displayed. Each message contains a reference to the corresponding field and can clicked to enter the field.
translations.Select this track for multiple track ope: Select this track for multiple track operations
